scripts.dev: concurrently "turbo run dev" "cd apps/main-api && go run main.go" "cd apps/solana-api && yarn dev"
scripts.wallet:build:dev: yarn workspace wallet eas build --profile development
scripts.wallet:build:prod: yarn workspace wallet eas build --profile production
scripts.pos:build:dev: yarn workspace pos eas build --profile development
scripts.pos:build:prod: yarn workspace pos eas build --profile production
scripts.prototype:build:dev: yarn workspace prototype eas build --profile development
scripts.prototype:build:prod: yarn workspace prototype eas build --profile production
